name: Mage Battle Arena
description:
Instructions:

w, a, s and d to move.

Left-click to cast a spell.

If using Summon Minions spell, you can right-click to send all of your minions to a target you click on.

Press E to open your character page. There's a bug that makes it so you have to press E twice to open it the first time.

Tip: you can move and cast a spell at the same time.
